QuestData.Title: Broker's Bounty: Ensydius the Defiler
QuestData.Description:
A winged Mawsworn named Ensydius the Defiler is hampering the efforts of the Cartel in Korthia.
Anyone who exterminates this evil will be rewarded.
Use caution. Ensydius is a powerful foe. You may require several allies to defeat him.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thanks to you, Ensydius the Defiler will no longer hinder Cartel Xy here in Korthia.
You have my personal thanks as well, Maw Walker. I see many great things in our future.
Please accept this reward as a token of our gratitude.
